text:
Hello, when trying to retrieve the Mobile SDK settings for iOS and Android, on my existing inbox, I get the following error message.

I tried creating a new inbox and was able to get the info on the new inbox.
Am I missing some configuration on my end?

Also <@U06GS7BG27J> Would you be able to enable access to the mobile SDK on our sandbox environment (Hubid: 44711420) so we can there instead.
I've DMd you RE: the error you're seeing, <@U06GS7BG27J> will follow up RE access.
We also want to integrate a web-based customer service system. Do you have relevant documentation?

Hello, it's me again. we managed to get the chat working on Android with a basic workflow and successfully use the authentication to validate users.
We have tried connecting setting up the push notifications but after clicking on "Save", we have a loading wheel and a :heavy_check_mark: but on refresh it still shows the status as "Not Set Up".

Is there any way to troubleshoot the connection and see why it failed to set up?

In case you need more details.
HubSpot Portal: 44588995
Inbox: Mobile Chat
Push Notification platform being set-up: Android
